meanings.definition: A person who is new to a particular activity or online community.
meanings.sent1: The newbie asked a lot of questions in the online game.
meanings.sent2: The newbie joined the photography club to learn new skills.
meanings.sent3: The newbie accidentally posted a selfie in the group chat meant for the wrong group.
meanings.sent4: Being a newbie in the world of coding felt like learning a new language.
meanings.sent5: The newbie's excitement to learn was contagious among the group.

meanings.definition: A beginner or novice in a particular field or subject.
meanings.sent1: The newbie in the cooking class burned the first batch of cookies.
meanings.sent2: As a newbie in gardening, she planted her flowers too close together.
meanings.sent3: The newbie chef mistook salt for sugar in the recipe, creating a unique dish.
meanings.sent4: Becoming a newbie in painting opened up a whole new world of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The newbie's determination to improve inspired others in the class.
